crowd_speed.description: sets the speed of the crowd: 2 is normal speed, 1 slower, 3 faster

crowd_startSize.description: Sets the start size of the crowd.

endless_mode.description: Sets whether the level is Endless or not.

hide_ui.description: Used to hide parts of the ui. If the argument is left empty, no elements should be hidden.

hasTraps.description: Indicates if the level has traps/obstacles.

hasCloningGates.description: Indicates if the level has cloning gates.

hasEnemyCrowds.description: Indicates if the level has enemy crowds.

crowdFinalSize.description: Sets the minimum amount the crowd needs to have in order to fire the LEVEL_SUCCESS event. If this minimum is not reached, as LEVEL_FAIL should be sent.

crowd_current_amount.description: Fires when the crowd gets hit by any kind of obstacle or when using a cloning gate or when reaching the goal. Tracks the current number of characters in the crowd.

obstacle_hit.description: Fires when the crowd gets hit by any kind of obstacle. It tracks by what obstacle the crowd got hit.

characters_died.description: The number of characters died in total during the level. Sent every time a character dies.

battles:won.description: The number of battles won during the level. Sent every time a battle is won.
